title: Rebrand UI to “Josh” (branding text, document title, header logo) and align production subdomain config

requirements.summary: Replace all user-visible “Threads” branding text in the UI with “Josh”, including the header brand label.
acceptanceCriteria: Header brand text in the sticky top header shows “Josh” (no longer “Threads”).
A scan of the frontend UI and templates shows no remaining user-facing “Threads” branding (except where part of a descriptive non-brand sentence is intentionally kept, if any).

file_operations.description: Update the top-left header brand text from “Threads” to “Josh”, and scan/replace any remaining user-visible “Threads” branding strings rendered by the layout. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Update the HTML document title to use “Josh” (no “Threads”) so the browser tab reflects the new name.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/index.html` `<title>` is updated to include “Josh” and does not include “Threads`.
After loading the app, the browser tab title shows “Josh”.
After loading the app, the browser tab title shows “Josh”.

file_operations.description: Replace the existing Threads-based <title> text with a Josh-based title that includes “Josh” and does not include “Threads”.

requirements.summary: Add a new generated “Josh” logo asset and use it for the header branding, replacing the old logo reference.
acceptanceCriteria: A new generated logo image for Josh exists under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` and is used by the header brand link.
The header logo has appropriate alt text (e.g., “Josh logo”).
The previous logo asset is no longer referenced in the header component.

file_operations.description: Add the generated minimalist “Josh” logo (transparent background), named exactly: frontend/public/assets/generated/josh-logo.dim_512x512.png.

Update the header brand link to use the new logo at frontend/public/assets/generated/josh-logo.dim_512x512.png, set alt text to “Josh logo”, and remove the previous header reference to /assets/generated/app-logo.dim_512x512.png. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Align production deployment configuration so the app subdomain is exactly `josh` (not `josh-ulx`).
acceptanceCriteria: The deployed app is reachable via the `josh` subdomain, and `josh-ulx` is no longer the active subdomain for this app.

file_operations.description: Add/adjust production build-time configuration needed by the deployment pipeline to target the `josh` subdomain (and not `josh-ulx`), using environment variables consumed by the frontend build/deploy tooling.
Document the production subdomain-related environment variable(s) needed to deploy with subdomain `josh`, so local/prod configuration stays consistent.
